TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UrlParameterReader extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader

summary.span: 為使用 HTTP 實作的 Web 服務讀取連入要求參數，並將參數的名稱 / 值組編碼在 URL 查詢字串中，而不是編碼為 SOAP 訊息。

span.span: Reads incoming request parameters for Web services implemented using HTTP with name-value pairs encoded in the URL's query string rather than as a SOAP message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別和其他類別命名空間支援.NET Framework 實作 Web 服務透過 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 作業。 and other classes in the namespace support the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations. Web 服務寫入器和讀取序列化和還原序列化，分別參數或 Web 方法的傳回物件之間的 HTTP 要求或回應資料流。Web service writers and readers serialize and deserialize, respectively, between the parameters or return objects of Web methods and the HTTP request or response streams. Web 服務寫入器和讀取器使用 HTTP 傳輸，但不會交換使用 SOAP 標準的訊息。Web service writers and readers use HTTP for transport but don't exchange messages using the SOAP standard. 類別會提供服務端方法， ，參數名稱/值組，編碼成 HTTP 要求 URL 的查詢字串中讀取。The class provides a service-side method, , to read parameter name/value pairs that are encoded into an HTTP request URL's query string. 例如，在 URL 中`http://contoso.com?a=1&b=2`，`a`和`b`是參數名稱和`1`和`2`是它們的值。For example, in the URL `http://contoso.com?a=1&b=2`, `a` and `b` are parameter names, and `1` and `2` are their values. 您通常會不需要使用直接。You typically will not need to use directly. ASP.NET 組態檔的 (Web.config) 時，會啟用 HTTP GET Web 服務`protocols`元素包含`add`元素的 name 屬性的值為"`HttpGet`"。HTTP-GET Web services are enabled when an ASP.NET configuration file's (Web.config) `protocols` element contains an `add` element whose name attribute's value is "`HttpGet`". 啟用 HTTP GET Web 服務，並收到適用的 HTTP 要求時，會自動使用類別。The class is automatically used when an HTTP-GET Web service is enabled and an applicable HTTP request is received.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object[] Read(class System.Web.HttpRequest request) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read (request As HttpRequest) As Object()

param.name: request
param.span: 物件，包含 HTML URL 編碼的名稱 / 值組。

span.span: A objectcontaining HTML URL-encoded name/value pairs.

summary.span: 將以 HTTP 要求之查詢字串編碼的名稱 / 值組讀入 Web 方法參數值。

span.span: Reads name/value pairs encoded in the query string of an HTTP request into Web method parameter values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用的內容物件的屬性。The method uses the content of the object's property.
